scenario.name: Smart Inbound
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:1234@1.1.1.1:5060 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP example.com:5060;branch=[branch] Call-ID: [call_id] From: "+85512234567"<sip:+85512234567@example.com;transport=udp;user=phone>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: "1234"<sip:1294@1.1.1.1;transport=udp;user=phone> CSeq: 1 INVITE Max-Forwards: 29 Contact: <sip:example.com:5060;transport=udp> Allow: INVITE,ACK,OPTIONS,BYE,CANCEL,INFO,PRACK,NOTIFY,MESSAGE,UPDATE P-Asserted-Identity: <tel:+85512234567> P-Early-Media: supported Supported: 100rel,timer,histinfo,precondition Min-SE: 90 Session-Expires: 1800;refresher=uac Content-Length: [len] Content-Type: application/sdp
v=0 o=HuaweiSoftx3000 1215612717 1215612718 IN IP4 2.2.2.2 s=SipCall c=IN IP4 2.2.2.2 t=0 0 m=audio 19936 RTP/AVP 8 100 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=rtpmap:100 telephone-event/8000 a=ptime:5 a=curr:qos local none a=curr:qos remote none a=des:qos mandatory local sendrecv a=des:qos optional remote sendrecv a=3gOoBTC

ACK sip:1234@freeswitch:5060;transport=udp SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP example.com:5060;branch=[branch] Call-ID: [call_id] From: "+85512234567" <sip:+85512234567@example.com;transport=udp;user=phone>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: "1234" <sip:1234@1.1.1.1;transport=udp;user=phone>[peer_tag_param] CSeq: 1 ACK Max-Forwards: 29 Content-Length: 0 Route: <sip:1.1.1.1:5060;lr;did=b46.ac484934>

BYE sip:1234@freeswitch:5060;transport=udp SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP example.com:5060;branch=[branch] Call-ID: [call_id] From: "+85512234567" <sip:+85512234567@example.com;transport=udp;user=phone>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: "1234" <sip:1234@1.1.1.1;transport=udp;user=phone>[peer_tag_param] CSeq: 2 BYE Contact: sip:sipp@27.109.112.140:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 29 Reason: Q.850;cause=31;text="Normal, unspecified" Content-Length: 0 Route: <sip:1.1.1.1:5060;lr;did=b46.ac484934>
